sources.title: Thunderbolt (1947)
sources.description: Documentary about the U.S. Air Force's P-47 Thunderbolt bomber's role in the Italian Campaign during WW2. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/thunderbolt-1947/

metadata.Plot: A documentary series on the operations of the 57th Fighter Group in 1944. Stationed in Corsica, their missions largely consisted of low-level attacks on the Italian mainland, far behind the front-line. Their targets were German supplies and the infrastructure carrying it. This was part of Operation Strangle, the idea of which was to weaken the German front-line forces through depriving them of supplies, thus helping the Allied offensive through Italy. The 57th Fighter Group flew one of the greatest fighter-bombers of the war, the iconic Republic P-47 Thunderbolt.
metadata.Actors: James Stewart, John K. Cannon, Ira C. Eaker
